video:video.video:description: This year, the finals for the Imagine Cup brought student competitors from 180 countries all over the world to India to compete in 6 different categories. I focused my attention on the short film&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Dinosaurs! Animatronics at the Natural History Museum in London
video:video.video:description: I went overseas...to go back in time. The London Natural History Museum has an amazing exhibit up right now featuring the latest technology in animatronics. Of course, its no fun to show off life-like&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Xbox executive Peter Moore talks openly about Xbox, wii, PS3 and more...
video:video.video:description: Peter Moore sat down for an intimate chat with some Xbox community site leaders and I crashed the party. This man is like a God to me so it was AWESOME to hear his thoughts on the Wii , Xbox 360 and&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Alex Albrecht talks about the creation of diggnation!
video:video.video:description: I went down to San Francisco to check out the release of digg V3 and I ran into my old buddy Alex Albrecht. Alex is currently the co-host of diggnation with Kevin Rose while also pursuing his acting&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Today in Tech
video:video.video:description: Laura and Tina serve up their most recent fun findings from the net.
